notes:
The data shows the ground and Satellite-Based Damage Assessment in Western CAR (2013-2014)
Human Rights Watch ground and satellite-based damage assessment of 790 villges and towns in western Central African Republic (CAR) covering the period from April 2013 to April 2014. A total of 125 villages had identified building destruction related to the conflict, with a total of over 17,500 mostly destroyed residential buildings.
